title: ETERNALS: Every EASTER EGG in the Final Trailer + Namor Origin EXPLAINED | MARVEL Breakdown
author: ScreenCrush
comment: It’s been a while since I’ve felt “This is going to be epic. LETS GO!” from a Marvel Trailer. Can’t wait!
This trailer is definitely an improvement compared to the last one.
Every movie post-Endgame will always beg the question, “Where were you this whole time and why didn’t you fight Thanos?”

The visuals in the Eternals looks absolutely amazing and I'm really looking forward to this film. The emergence could be referring to Doug emerging as the true mastermind behind the ScreenCrush breakdown videos. Give him the credit he deserves!
description:
Marvel's final trailer for the Eternals has finally dropped, explaining why the Eternals ignored Thanos and left the heavy lifting to the Avengers. We also get a clear look at the Deviants and the Celestials, the enemies and creators of the Eternals, respectively. And while we get an introduction to each character we also get a feel for how this movie while fit into the Marvel Cinematic Universe, and why the Eternals are so important to the future of the MCU.

We also get our first scene with Kit Harrington's Dane Whitman, AKA the Avenger the Black Knight, and a hint of his relationship with Sersei from the comics. 

If you're new, Subscribe! →
